title: New app design challenge centered around career and technical ed
text:
09 New app design challenge centered around career and technical ed 
eSchool News: A new mobile app competition with backing from the Department of Education and the First Lady is hoping to promote enthusiasm for higher education, including career and technical schools. In particular, the challenge is looking for apps that help students learn about various career options and assess their interests.
